thread.title: Connie Evans
thread.title_full: Euroflorist Belgique / België Beoordeeld door Connie Evans

author: Connie Evans
title: Connie Evans
text:
Ordered a large bouquet to Belgium, didn't know what to expect.
My cousin was extremely pleased with the arrangement.
Flowers were fresh and brightly coloured as shown on website.
Delivery was to the exact date....THANK YOU.
